title: Meditation: The Presence Beyond Thoughts
itunes:title: Meditation: The Presence Beyond Thoughts
description: Meditation: The Presence Beyond Thoughts - We spend many life moments in a trance of thinking. This meditation awakens the senses through a body scan, and attention to sound. We then rest in the presence that can come alive in the gap between thoughts—the presence that is our true home.
